name: Dota2Handbook
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource: 'unsafe-inline';default-src 'self';connect-src *;style-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource: 'unsafe-inline';img-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource:;font-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource:;media-src *;
